phrs.translation: 蛔虫, 人蛔虫, 如人蛔虫
似蚓蛔线虫, 似蚓蛔线虫的简称, 似蚓蛔线虫即俗称人蛔虫
虫体腔液, 人蛔虫体腔液, 目的观察蛔虫体腔液, 用人蛔虫体腔液

sentences.sentence: Most of the examined Ascaris eggs were at the infective stage.
sentences.translation: 检出的虫卵绝大部分是感染性虫卵。

sentences.sentence: Objective To understand the inactivation effect on Ascaris suum eggs in urine directing toilet.
sentences.translation: 目的了解新型厕所—粪尿分集式厕所对猪蛔虫卵的灭活效果。

sentences.sentence: It involved 300 villagers in an area of Madagascar where both Ascaris and Plasmodium are prevalent.
sentences.translation: 这项研究使用了300名马达加斯加的村民。蛔虫和恶性疟原虫都在这一地区流行。
